title: Bug 101187: Localization key cannot be blank when adding
description:
Bug 101187: Localization key cannot be blank when adding.

Description: When the key for externalized text is left blank, the text cannot be displayed in the chart.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Set the key in the properties file to be blank, but ensure it has a valid value.

OB: The externalized text in the chart title is not displayed.

EB: The externalized text should be displayed in the chart title.

SR: Set the externalized text in the chart title.
